set.name: Four Big Kings Gathering! Super King Pack!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MUGEN CLIMB} Water/Darkness 2(You may summon this creature from your hand or graveyard by tapping 2 of your creatures and paying Water/Darkness 2.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose another creature that costs 5 or less. Ignore any abilities of that creature until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: Four Big Kings Gathering! Super King Pack!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} {ABARECHAIN}: Whenever any of your creatures attacks, if it's the first attack this turn, that creature gets +6000 power until the end of the turn and "powered breaker". (A creature that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.)

property.name: Set
property.value: Four Big Kings Gathering! Super King Pack!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put one of your shields into your graveyard. {OSHIOKIMOON}: Whenever a card leaves your shield zone, your opponent chooses and destroys one of their creatures.

property.name: Set
property.value: Four Big Kings Gathering! Super King Pack!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {VIVIDDRAW} {F1} (During your turn, when you draw this creature before you attack, you may reveal it. If you do, you may pay Fire 1 to summon this creature this turn.)

property.name: Set
property.value: Four Big Kings Gathering! Super King Pack!!
